mapper.select: SELECT mmu.user_id AS userId, mmu.nickname, mmu.sex AS sex, mmu.mobile, mmu.birthday, mmu.`name`, mmu.level AS userLevel FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users mmu WHERE user_id =#{userId}

SELECT mmc.user_id AS 'userId', mmc.franchisee_id AS 'franchiseeId', mui.name AS 'name', mui.mobile AS 'mobile', mui.idcard AS 'idCard', mui.lunar_birthday AS 'lunarBirthday', mui.`CHARACTER` AS 'character', mui.constellation AS 'constellation', mui.is_marrige AS 'isMarrige', mui.wedding_day AS 'weddingDay', mui.is_estate AS 'isEstate', mui.is_member AS 'isMember', mui.car_brand AS 'carBrand', mui.children AS 'children', mui.occupation AS 'occupation', mui.monthly_income AS 'income', mui.menstrual_date AS 'menstrualDate', mui.menstrual_peroid AS 'menstrualPeroid', mui.weight AS 'weight', mui.height AS 'height', mui.critical_diseases AS 'criticalDiseases', mui.promotion_agent AS 'promotionAgent', mui.c_using_brand AS 'usingBrand', mui.c_intrest AS 'intrest', mui.c_taboo AS 'taboo', mui.c_hate AS 'hate', mui.remark AS 'remark', mmc.beauty_id AS 'beautyId', tsu.name AS 'beautyName', mmc.office_id AS 'officeId', tso.name AS 'officeName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_customer mmc LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_info mui ON (mmc.user_id = mui.mtmy_user_id AND mmc.franchisee_id = mui.franchisee_id) LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user tsu ON mmc.beauty_id = tsu.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office tso ON tso.id = mmc.office_id WHERE mmc.user_id=#{userId} AND mmc.franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_user_info( mtmy_user_id, franchisee_id, name, idcard, lunar_birthday, `character`, constellation, is_marrige, wedding_day, is_estate , is_member, car_brand, children , occupation, monthly_income , menstrual_date, menstrual_peroid, weight, height, critical_diseases, promotion_agent, c_using_brand, c_intrest, c_taboo, c_hate, remark, create_by , create_date ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{franchiseeId}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{lunarBirthday}, #{character}, #{constellation}, #{isMarrige}, #{weddingDay}, #{isEstate}, #{isMember} , #{carBrand} , #{children}, #{occupation}, #{income} , #{menstrualDate}, #{menstrualPeroid}, #{weight} , #{height}, #{criticalDiseases}, #{promotionAgent}, #{usingBrand}, #{intrest}, #{taboo} , #{hate} , #{remark} , #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_user_info SET name= #{name}, idcard=#{idCard}, lunar_birthday= #{lunarBirthday}, `character`= #{character}, constellation= #{constellation}, is_marrige= #{isMarrige}, wedding_day= #{weddingDay}, is_estate=#{isEstate}, is_member= #{isMember} , car_brand= #{carBrand} , children= #{children}, occupation= #{occupation}, monthly_income= #{income} , menstrual_date=#{menstrualDate}, menstrual_peroid=#{menstrualPeroid}, weight=#{weight}, height=#{height}, critical_diseases=#{criticalDiseases}, promotion_agent=#{promotionAgent}, c_using_brand=#{usingBrand} , c_intrest=#{intrest}, c_taboo= #{taboo}, c_hate= #{hate}, remark=#{remark} WHERE mtmy_user_id = #{userId} AND franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId}

SELECT mu.user_id AS userId, mu.`name`, mu.sex, mu.mobile, mu.nickname, mu.level_value AS 'levelvalue', mu.reg_time regTime, MIN(mo.add_time) firstDate, MAX(mo.add_time) lastDate, muyl.`level` AS 'level', mc.franchisee_id AS 'franchiseeId', tsf. NAME AS 'franchiseeName', tsu.`name` AS 'beautyName', tso.`name` AS 'shopName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users mu LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_customer mc ON mc.user_id = mu.user_id AND mc.franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId} LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders mo ON mc.user_id = mo.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_yz_level muyl ON mu.level_value >= muyl.min_val AND mu.level_value <= muyl.max_val LEFT JOIN trains.sys_franchisee tsf ON mc.franchisee_id = tsf.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user tsu ON mc.beauty_id = tsu.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office tso ON mc.office_id = tso.id WHERE 1=1
AND ( locate( #{officeId}, concat(mc.office_pids, mc.office_id) ) > 0 )
AND muyl.level =#{level}
AND ( mu.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%') OR mu.mobile like CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%') OR mu.name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%') )
GROUP BY mc.user_id ORDER BY mu.reg_time DESC
